basic_info.description_header: I am a programmer engaged in education as a programming instructor at N High School and S High School.
basic_info.description: I was born in 1982 in Kure City, Hiroshima Prefecture. My handle is sifue. I passed the Applied Information Technology Engineer Examination/VR Engineer Certificate (Theory)/JDLA Deep Learning For GENERAL. I have worked as a development leader at an system integrator and as a development leader for Nico Nico Live Broadcasting, but a chance encounter led me to teach programming at a high school. My specialties are server-side and client-side concurrency implementation, RDB data modeling and operations, and application development using TypeScript/JavaScript/Java/Scala. What I want to do is to create software that many people will enjoy. Making development fun is an important value for me. I enjoy competitive online games (e-sports) and play LoL and Apex Legends.
